snippet.title: UNO FLIP! LAUNCH TRAILER
snippet.description:
Brace yourself for a new UNO™ experience with the UNO FLIP!™ DLC. 
Rediscover the matching game you know with an exciting twist: a double-sided deck!
Flip the whole deck and play with new Action cards funnier than ever.

Play nice with the Light Side cards:
- Draw one card: the next player must draw one card and lose their turn.
- Wild draw two cards: you get to choose the color that continues play and the next player must draw two cards from the DRAW pile and lose their turn.

Spice things up with the Dark Side cards:
- Draw five cards: the next player must draw five cards and lose their turn.
- Skip everyone card: all players lose their turn. 
- Wild draw color card: the next player must draw until they get a color of your choice and lose their turn.

Uno Flip! is now available on PS4, Xbox One, Switch and PC!
